category: Category 3: Financial System & Regulatory Data (Systemic Context)

fabricated.financial_regulation_index: Min-max normalized average of Z-score, credit to private sector, and WGI Regulatory Quality per year.
fabricated.digital_lending_guideline_dummy: Set to 1 from first year when both WGI RQ and credit to private sector exceed their country medians; purely heuristic proxy for regulatory shift toward digital finance.

caveats: Missingness varies by country and year; no imputation performed.
Use ROA after-tax by default; switchable via flag.

source.name: World Bank API
source.notes: Indicators: NPL ratio, Z-score, ROA, Domestic credit to private sector, WGI Regulatory Quality

source.name: IMF Financial Access Survey / BIS / Central Banks
source.notes: Additional context for regulatory landscape (for fabricated index and policy dummies)
